params.startDate: We compute the weight for the tokens staked until 'date' on 'startDate'.

computeWeightByDate(uint256,uint256).return: The weighted stake the account had as of the given block.

getPriorWeightedStake(address,uint256,ui.details: Block number must be a finalized block or else this function will revert to prevent misinformation.     Used for fee sharing, not voting.

params.account: The address of the account to check.
params.blockNumber: The block number to get the vote balance at.
params.date: The date/timestamp of the unstaking time.

getPriorWeightedStake(address,uint256,ui.return: The weighted stake the account had as of the given block.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.blockNumber: The block number, needed for checkpointing.
params.date: The staking date to compute the power for. Adjusted to the previous valid lock date, if necessary.
params.startDate: The date for which we need to know the power of the stake. Adjusted to the previous valid lock date, if necessary.

computeWeightByDate(uint256,uint256).notice: Compute the weight for a specific date.

getPriorWeightedStake(address,uint256,ui.notice: Determine the prior weighted stake for an account as of a block number. Iterate through checkpoints adding up voting power.

weightedStakeByDate(address,uint256,uint.notice: Compute the voting power for a specific date. Power = stake * weight

nodes.name: getPriorWeightedStake
weightedStakeByDate
_weightedStakeByDate
computeWeightByDate
